directoryOverview: MyPortfolio is the trainee portfolio management module providing comprehensive document management, demographics tracking, training history, financial records (stipends/contracts), accreditation compliance, scholarly activities, quality improvement projects, curricula management, and report generation. It serves as the central hub for managing all aspects of a trainee's academic and professional portfolio in GME and nursing programs.
keyWorkflows: Portfolio document upload and management workflow
Accreditation compliance documentation and email notifications
Training history and program history tracking
Learning appraisal and quiz assignment workflows
